title: Checking how much money you spent on leauge
body:
Hey guys, I'm just wondering if that link to check how much you've spent on leauge of legends is legit. Kind of sus about it so I wanted to see if any of you guys knew what's going on. Cheers fellas

Update- here's the link to the site I'm sus about 
https://privacy.riotgames.com

replies.body:
I think I've spent over a grand and a half. 

Although I've been playing for about 7 years now. Which I don't really regret. Works out to about $200 per year.
Now I own all champions and literally just use ip for new champions and open hextek chests for skins. So hey, I'm happy with the way Riot runs this game.
When your only 13 and you have spent 1500$ -_-
23 years old when I wrote that post. But "close enough", as all your teachers would probably say.

GG
AUD	158.0
i dont waste 2 much money :D

$135 NZ. Mainly spent on mystery gift circles with friends

I probably have [skins worth more due to the mystery gifts](http://imgur.com/4rsU9VJ) though ^-^
Post the link to the cite your not sure about and I'll see if it's safe or not.
This is safe and it gives accurate reading of your account. Nothing dangerous.

Holy shit this is me.
:(

"
Other
1380.0 

USD
210.0 

AUD
1435.0 
"

Talon12

User Name	Thats Right
Email	thats right
Server	OCE
Mastery Pages	19
Rune Pages	5
Money Spent
$90 AUD

Gameplay History no history

seems about right, nothing happened, it just gave accurate (to my understanding) stats

And dayum, didn't realise I had been gifted so much ($80) rp, only rp that wasn't gifted to me was a $10 so I could get all meh Yasuo skins
The site is legitimate. The extra "looking for more" bit where you have to hand write a letter and make a $5 payment is to adhere to the EU privacy laws afaik.
send a support ticket to find out how much you have spent

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=OlziTKai,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-20T22:25:00.205+0000)
>
> send a support ticket to find out how much you have spent

This.
I'm not sure I want to know to be honest... lmao
